coref: A Bull once escaped from a Lion by entering a cave which the Goatherds used to house their flocks in stormy weather and at night. It happened that one of the Goats had been left behind, and A Bull A Bull had no sooner got inside than this Goat lowered Goat head and made a rush at Goat, butting Goat with Goat horns. As a Lion a Lion was still prowling outside the entrance to the cave, A Bull A Bull had to submit to the insult. Do not think, A Bull said, that I submit to your cowardly treatment because I am afraid of you. When that a Lion leaves, I'll teach you a lesson you won't forget.
